category.name: Manufacturing

preference.name: AppInterface_TCPublishingTechnicalPortfolio_shown_relations
preference.preference_description: Used for configuring Teamcenter manufacturing process management technical portfolios. Defines the relations available when pasting a TCPublishingTechnicalPortfolio dataset under an intermediate data capture (IDC) while creating technical portfolios. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid Teamcenter relation and it must include the value set for the AppInterface_TCPublishingTechnicalPortfolio_default_relation preference.
